name: Holy Dungeon
description:
Holy Dungeon is a reverse dungeon crawler which places YOU in the shoes of the villain.

Use your cards to summon powerful monsters and use magic spells to defeat the Knight. But don't let him reach the end or you lose.

TUTORIAL:

  • To move the camera, use the W A S D buttons
  • To speed up the camera, use the SHIFT button
  • To attack, you need to select a card and click on the playing field

Code - Goreeeo

Graphics - EviledGood
